meanings.definition: Having a strong desire to eat or consume food.
meanings.sent1: The kids were munchier than usual after playing outside all day.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the munchier snacks when watching movies.
meanings.sent3: The cat gave me a munchier look when I opened a can of tuna.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked cookies made the room feel even munchier.
meanings.sent5: The thought of warm soup on a cold day made her feel even munchier.

meanings.definition: A person who eats or consumes food in a hearty or voracious manner.
meanings.sent1: My brother is the munchier in our family, always finishing his plate first.
meanings.sent2: The munchier at the party devoured all the appetizers within minutes.
meanings.sent3: The munchier at the table made everyone laugh with his speed-eating skills.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the munchier among her friends for her love of trying new foods.
meanings.sent5: The little boy's eyes widened as he watched the munchier finish a whole pizza by himself.
